name: sosse
description: Sosse is a self-hosted social link page that aggregates your profiles and links into a single personal page with themes, analytics, and simple management.
features: Link aggregation: Creates single page with all your social and web links.
Custom themes: Personalizes appearance with colors, fonts, and layouts.
Analytics tracking: Monitors link clicks and visitor statistics.
Social icons: Displays recognizable icons for popular platforms.
Custom links: Adds unlimited links to any URL or content.
Profile photo: Uploads profile picture or avatar for personal branding.
Bio section: Adds description or tagline to your link page.
Link scheduling: Shows or hides links based on date and time.
SEO optimization: Configures meta tags for search engine visibility.
Custom domain: Uses your own domain for professional appearance.
Mobile optimized: Ensures links display perfectly on all devices.
No coding required: Builds link page through simple web interface.
